synopsis.text: She may be a terrestrial teenager, but Umika Konohoshi feels like an extraterrestrial misfit in her high school. Her fascination with aliens and her timid nature have made her an outsider among her peers. But when a self-proclaimed alien, Yuu Akeuchi, transfers to her class, Umika's world takes an interstellar turn. Yuu's telepathic abilities and mysterious past intrigue Umika, and the two form an unlikely bond. Together, they embark on a mission to build a rocket and explore the cosmos, forging friendships and breaking free from their earthly constraints. Will Umika's dream of befriending an alien and journeying to space finally come true? Join her as she navigates the challenges of high school, self-discovery, and intergalactic adventures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
